trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_000<tab>Feast your eyes upon the Fields of Gold! ...Well, they're <var 1A 02 /var>usually<var 1A 01 /var> a treat for the senses, but I'm afraid our reeds have seen better days.
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_001<tab>Welcome to the Fields of Gold, made beautiful once again by you and yours! Is there anything you wish to know about our wonderful reeds?

TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_002<tab>Come to gaze upon the Fields of Gold once again? As you can see, they grow with as much vitality as ever. If you have anything to ask, please do─reeds are my favorite topic.

TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_010<tab>Reeds form the backbone of Hanuhanu society, and I wanted to contribute by tending these fields. But nothing I've tried can spur their growth. I'm afraid the next harvest will be...disappointing.

TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_011<tab>I want nothing more but to savor their sweet taste, and share it with my brothers and sisters! Oh, just imagining a bundle of reeds in my mouth makes it water...

TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_012<tab>I'm in charge of growing these reeds, which form the backbone of Hanuhanu society! We had disappointing harvests for some time, but the Third Promise and her companions fixed all that─hopefully for good!
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_013<tab>Once again I can savor their sweet taste and avail myself of the land's energy. Oh, there goes my stomach rumbling again...
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_020<tab>These fields got their name from the color of the sprouting reeds, although you wouldn't believe it to see them now...
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_021<tab>It was such an enchanting sight...and I don't know how to bring it back.
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_022<tab>These fields get their name from the golden reeds which you see before us. Quite the enchanting sight, yes?
TEXT_REGYOK6FIELDSOFGOLD_00905_DANUHALI_000_023<tab>This is all thanks to you and your companions. Thank you for revitalizing the reeds, and in so doing bringing life back to Ok'hanu!
